entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
